channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Find and Replace All
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Find and Replace All

item.title: CVE-2022-3850|2024-08-03T01:20:58.384Z -- unknown -- find%20and%20replace%20all
item.description: The Find and Replace All WordPress plugin before 1.3 does not have CSRF check when replacing string, which could allow attackers to make a logged admin replace arbitrary string in database tables via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2022-2311|2024-08-03T00:32:09.387Z -- unknown -- find%20and%20replace%20all
item.description: The Find and Replace All WordPress plugin before 1.3 does not sanitize and escape some parameters from its setting page before outputting them back to the user, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue.
